thread.title: WIN a family bounce and climb session at Velocity trampoline centre
thread.title_full: WIN a family bounce and climb session at Velocity trampoline centre

author: Emma Gill
title: WIN a family bounce and climb session at Velocity trampoline centre
text:
WIN a family bounce and climb session at Velocity trampoline centre It's the only centre in the area offering trampolining and Clip n Climb under one roof Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester's only trampoline centre offering bounce sessions and Clip n Climb under one roof has teamed up with Manchester Family to give one lucky family the chance to try it out for FREE. 
Velocity has more than 90 interconnected trampolines, a foam pit airbag, basketball and dodgeball courts and a Gladiator-style jousting area. 
But its brightest and boldest feature is its Clip n Climb experience featuring climbing walls, a 'stairway to heaven' to step across, a leap of faith and an awesome vertical drop slide. Read More UK's first ever alpine rollercoaster will take you on thrilling ride through Snowdonia National Park 
Wearing a safety helmet and zip up suit, children hold on to a bar which pulls them to the top of the slide before falling down the 25ft drop at speed and bouncing off the bottom. 
One lucky reader will win a family pass for the trampolines and Clip n Climb. And when they've worked up an appetite doing all that, they'll get pizza and drinks too - from a new menu which includes wraps, hot dogs, paninis and more. 
Special offers include a hot dog and soft drink for Â£3. Read More Work starts on thrilling tree-top adventure playground at Heaton Park - including mid-air trampolines 
Velocity's climbing sessions are available to anyone over four years old and under 150 kgs, 'dependent on strength, skill and bravery'. 
Based at Wheatlea Industrial Estate, in Caxton Close, Wigan, the centre - open daily from 10am to 8pm (9pm on Fridays) - also offers fitness classes, toddler time sessions and children's birthday parties. 
To be in with a chance of winning the family pass for four, simply leave your name in the comments under the post on our Manchester Family Facebook page here and we'll pick the winner next week. 
The deadline for entries is midnight on Thursday, February 2. Remember you must be a fan of Manchester Family to qualify. 
For more details about Velocity visit velocitygb.com/wigan .
